services.description: As the adage goes â€“ 'Practice makes a man perfect!' QuickSort gives you a platform to practice your interviewing skills in an environment similar to an actual interview.
QuickSort is built on the premise that practice & preparation are crucial. Prime your coding skills by accessing the best hand-picked and curated content covering problems from all domains.

QuickSort provides you comprehensive feedback based on your performance underlining your strengths and personalized tips on improving weaker areas. Get in-depth analysis of your interview style and tips to help you improve.

benefits.description: Doubts about handling stressful situations during interviews & performance pressure may create anxiety. Get over your nerves with mock interviews.
Practicing Mock interviews & coding assessments with experienced programmers will improve your skills and boost confidence.
Attend mock interviews from anywhere- virtual/ face-to-face, eliminating the need & the costs associated with travel. Moreover, you save time!
Get in-depth analysis of your interview style and tips to help you improve areas where you may have weaknesses.
Catering 50+ interview experineces with tech-giants like Google, Microsoft to familiarise you with the skills & competencies needed for the job.
Mastering questions not only from technical domain but behavioural questions like -'Tell me about yourself.' gives you an edge.

extra.video_description: Did you check out the trending webinar on Codess yet? Watch it now!
